subject: Gambling
Super Bowl
Athletics and Sports
Football
lead_paragraph: The league frowns upon gambling on football, but close friends and founding fathers of the N.F.L., Art Rooney and Tim Mara were gamblers, and proud ones.
snippet: The league frowns upon gambling on football, but close friends and founding fathers of the N.F.L., Art Rooney and Tim Mara were gamblers, and proud ones.
